name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Programming Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, blending strong programming expertise in **C#**, **Java**, **Python**, and **C++**. Demonstrated proficiency in developing robust solutions alongside a passion for teaching and fostering creativity within teams. Skilled in architectural principles, leveraging advanced technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and backend frameworks such as **Node.js** and **FastAPI**.
Adept at creating AI/ML-powered platforms that drive predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proven track record in cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, integrating microservices and event-driven architectures, along with implementation of CI/CD pipelines.
Focused on compliance-driven development, successfully aligning projects with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, with extensive hands-on experience in MLOps, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
